sentences.en: He became superintendent of the bank's East African branches.
sentences.cn: 他成了该银行东非分行的行长。

sentences.en: He was soon promoted to the post of superintendent of Foreign Trade.
sentences.cn: 他很快就被擢升为对外贸易总监.

sentences.en: He was stopped at the airport by an assistant superintendent of police.
sentences.cn: 他在机场被一名助理警长扣留了。

sentences.en: I am a natural superintendent on all these occasions.
sentences.cn: 凡是这种场合我都是当然的主持人.

sentences.en: I am astounded at the comments made by the Chief Superintendent.
sentences.cn: 主管的评语让我大吃一惊。

sentences.en: Mr. Superintendent next asked to see Miss Rachel herself.
sentences.cn: 局长先生接下来要求见见雷茜儿小姐.

sentences.en: Newspaper reporters were given nothing but the bare facts by the Superintendent in charge of the investigation.
sentences.cn: 报社的记者们从负责这起调查的督察那里得到的只是一些最基本的情况。

sentences.en: Superintendent Fairbairn was still clucking at the photographers, warning them he'd be speaking to their editor.
sentences.cn: 费尔贝恩警长还在表达对摄影师们的不满，警告说他会和他们的主编谈谈。

sentences.en: The officer in charge of the case is Superintendent Lewis.
sentences.cn: 负责这件案子的警官是警长刘易斯.

sentences.en: The school superintendent was worried about the lack of qualified teachers.
sentences.cn: 教育厅长对缺少合格的教师感到忧虑.

sentences.en: The Superintendent of Public Works gives orders for all watercourses to be inspected.
sentences.cn: 公共建设部部长下令检查所有河道。

sentences.en: The superintendent of school would ask you to teach here in Jackson.
sentences.cn: 学校的校长想请你在杰克逊这里教书.

sentences.en: the superintendent of schools in Dallas
the superintendent of the Methodist Church in Hawaii
sentences.cn: 夏威夷卫理公会负责人

sentences.en: The superintendent ordered a thorough investigation of the case.
sentences.cn: 警长命令对这一案件作彻底调查.

sentences.en: The superintendent swaggered into the schoolyard.
sentences.cn: 督学阔步高视地走进校园.

trans.tran_cn: （部门）主管，负责人，（英国）中级警官，警司， （大楼的）管理人
trans.tran_en: a high rank in the British police, or someone who has this rank
